name: make them FAT
description:
Welcome

this is my first completed game for my first game jam (beginners jam #2)

------------------------

Instructions 

You must shoot the zombies in the head so they eat the candy 

they get fat when eat and get thinner when move you must blow them before they get thinner 

you have HP in the top left of the screen it represented by a candy 

you get 1 hp for the candy you eat 

------------------------------

sorry there is no sounds or animation (i put a gif here ,  the anmation works only on one enemy in the scene at a time ) i was considering to put some but i couldnt in the time and wait me in the next beginners jam ill make a good game :)

<3<3<3<3<3

I hope you enjoy it thank you :)

<3<3<3<3<3
